hero.subtitle: Master the scientifically-backed 4-7-8 breathing technique. Beautiful animations. Haptic guidance. HRV tracking.
hero.platforms: Available on iPhone and Apple Watch.

technique.label: The Technique
technique.description: Developed by Dr. Andrew Weil, the 4-7-8 breathing technique is a natural tranquilizer for the nervous system. Four cycles is all it takes.
technique.inhaleDesc: Breathe in quietly through your nose

iphone.label: iPhone
iphone.feature1Desc: A living, breathing flower animation guides your rhythm with fluid motion and color transitions.
iphone.feature2Desc: Subtle vibrations mark each phase so you can close your eyes and simply feel the rhythm.
iphone.feature3Desc: Track every session. View trends. Build a daily practice with streaks and insights.

watch.label: Apple Watch
watch.description: A fully independent watchOS app. Start a session right from your wrist with beautiful animations and precise haptic feedback.

health.label: Health
health.card1Desc: Track your HRV before and after each session. See how breathing exercises improve your autonomic nervous system over time.
health.card2Desc: Monitor real-time heart rate during sessions. Watch your body respond as you breathe with rhythm and intention.
health.card3Desc: Every session automatically saves to Apple Health as mindful minutes. Your practice counts toward your daily goals.

benefits.title: Why 4-7-8?
benefits.b1Desc: Activate your parasympathetic nervous system in under 2 minutes.
benefits.b2Desc: Use as a pre-sleep routine to quiet racing thoughts.
benefits.b3Desc: Controlled breathing lowers cortisol levels naturally.
benefits.b4Desc: Reset your attention with a brief breathing break.
benefits.b5Desc: Streaks, history, and insights keep you motivated.
benefits.b6Desc: All data stays on your device. No accounts. No tracking.

privacy.sectionDesc: 4-7-8 Breathe processes everything on-device. No accounts. No cloud. No tracking. Your health data never leaves your iPhone or Apple Watch.

cta.subtitle: Free to download. Available on iPhone and Apple Watch.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.overviewText: 4-7-8 Breathe ("the App") is designed with your privacy as a top priority. We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. Everything stays on your device.
privacyPage.dataCollectionText: The App does not collect any personal information. Specifically:
dataCollectionItems: No account creation or sign-in required
No crash reporting to external servers
No data shared with third parties
privacyPage.healthDataText: The App integrates with Apple HealthKit to read heart rate variability (HRV) and heart rate data, and to write mindful minutes. This data is:
healthDataItems: Accessed only with your explicit permission
Never shared with any third party
privacyPage.healthDataFooter: All health data is managed by Apple's HealthKit framework and subject to Apple's privacy policies.
privacyPage.storageText: Your breathing session history and preferences are stored locally on your iPhone and Apple Watch using SwiftData. This data is not accessible to us or any third party.
privacyPage.networkText: The App does not make any network requests. It works entirely offline.
privacyPage.childrenText: The App does not collect any data from anyone, including children under the age of 13.
privacyPage.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with an updated revision date.
privacyPage.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
